bill.title: Senate Substitute for HB 2049 by Committee on Corrections and Juvenile Justice - Changing the definition of “significantly subaverage general intellectual functioning” related to intellectual disability.
bill.description: Senate Substitute for HB 2049 by Committee on Corrections and Juvenile Justice - Changing the definition of “significantly subaverage general intellectual functioning” related to intellectual disability.
